Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your life or work. I am offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $18000, reflecting its true worth and the opportunity it presents to you. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you and your needs. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering this opportunity. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
